org.spongepowered.api.data.manipulators.tileentities

Interface SignData

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Comparable<SignData>, DataManipulator<SignData>, DataSerializable

    public interface SignData
extends DataManipulator<SignData>
    Represents the data for a Sign.

      • getLines

        Text[] getLines()
        Gets all lines of text on the sign.
        Returns:
        The lines of text

      • setLines

        void setLines(Text... lines)
        Sets the lines of text on the sign. Any lines past the maximum number of lines displayable on the sign will be ignored.
        Parameters:
        lines - The new lines
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - If the array is too large
